name: The Accursed Crown
storyline: Generations ago, the curse of the Crown of the Giant King finally splintered the ancient Kingdom of Giants. Now, a hundred years later, the curse has spread its malevolent influence south, and engulfed the Duchy of Northfell in ruin and despair. A band of heroes is needed to break the curse and return peace and prosperity to the land.
summary: The Accursed Crown of the Giant King is an old school role-playing game, single player, party based.
